name: 清洗屋：帮助邻居人妻
description:
The game is introduced


Clean the house, a puzzle to solve escape game

To clean a house is, in effect, to take a commission to help others do some work.
On this day Melissa received a special job cleaning the house. Although the job is very common, the commission is too much. Melissa took the job because she had been without income for so long. But did not expect to be attacked, locked up.

Melissa needs to find clues from the environment, solve every complex puzzle in every room, and finally escape from the suffocating house.

Game elements


Puzzle adventure
The chamber of secrets escape

The game features


The room is filled with clues waiting to be searched
Experience the fun of the Chamber escape game by solving puzzles
